buy_sell_details.description: Details specific to the terms of a buy-sell agreement governing the transfer of ownership interests upon certain trigger events.

triggering_events.description: A list of events that activate the buy-sell agreement (e.g., 'Death', 'Disability', 'Retirement', 'Involuntary Termination').

purchase_obligation.description: Specifies if the buyout is mandatory or optional (e.g., 'Mandatory purchase by the Company', 'Option for remaining shareholders to purchase').

valuation_method.description: How the business interest is valued for the buyout (e.g., 'Certificate of Agreed Value', 'Formula based on revenue', 'Third-party appraisal').

funding_mechanism.description: How the buyout will be funded (e.g., 'Life insurance policies', 'Company cash flow', 'Promissory note over 5 years').

closing_timeline.description: The timeframe for completing the buyout after a triggering event (e.g., 'Within 90 days of the triggering event').
